attributes.action: stop the legal mugging of old ladies
attributes.additional_details: Its a disgrace that millions of women approaching 60 having paid full stamp all their working life are haveing to wait between 1-6 years extra for their OAP. This is legal mugging resulting in a loss of 25-30K+ . When politicians and bankers loose that much money so close to retirement then we will. Give us our promised pension back, we have worked for it and trusted the system. It was a contract we abided by and you broke. Young people will never provide for their pension now they have seen what has happened to their grannies.
